reviews.review: Again, another amazing continuation of the series with a twist that puts you in a new world. Other than some audio problems, a really good game.

This game was really cool and beautiful when it came out, entering a hopeful city with many loose references to America. I really enjoyed the lighting effects at the start, the interesting storyline/references, and Elizabeth's interesting and well-done role as both a main character for the story, as well as a teammate helping out throughout the story.
oha
Awesome!
Einfach wow. Ein Spiel mit Aussage.
Garbage ending
Rollercoaster ride of emotions and concepts. The gfx can get a bit shonky with some odd blurring here and there but overall loads of fun if you like the Bioshock universe.
Super Spiel mit einer mitreißenden Geschichte.
Amazing story

Un excelente juego, la movilidad del personaje es demasiada algo que me gusta en este tipo de juegos. Quizás llevar solo 2 armas es un poco limitante pero la variedad que hay da posibilidad a muchas combinaciones a llevar. Sin mencionar que la historia es espectacular y al terminarlo te deja en que pensar
Los DLC te llegan al corazón si has jugado las anteriores entregas de Bioshock.

Tek tek oyunu anlatıyım
1)oynanış harika
2)atmosfer tam anlamıyla harikulade ve sizi içine alıyor
3)yardımcı karakter olan Elizabeth in yapay zekası mükemmel yapılmış ve tasarlanmış her an size yardım ediyor ve atmosfere ayak uyduruyor
4)grafikler ise iyi çok iyi değil fakat iyi
5)hikaye olarakta mükemmel belki biraz kafanız karışabilir fakat hikayede gerçekten çok iyi bir iş başarılmış
6)animasyonlarda iyi 


Kısaca oyunu alın sıkılmazsınız yani mükemmel bir oyun ben şahsen hiç sıkıldığımı hatırlamıyorum

BioShock serisinin tüm oyunlarını oynadım. Bu oyun da serinin sonuncu oyunu. Herkesin paylaştığı gibi, hikaye çok başarılı. Oynanış bildiğimiz FPS. Vigor diye bahsedilen güçler var, oyun şeklinize göre seçip kullanıyorsunuz. Silah oldukça çeşitli ama 2 tanesini taşıyabiliyorsunuz. Kalkan vs var. Kanlı canlı ve enteresan bir bir teması var. İngilizceniz varsa oyunun hikayesi fena bağlıyor. Film gibi bir şey. Eve kapandığınız  şu dönemlerde (opel corsa toyota corona) 10 saat kadar sizi bilgisayara bağlayabilir.
I wish I could open tears like Elizabeth and play this game over and over again
Definitely the best in the serie. Great story. I'm impressed.

对于这款游戏 我是抱着看神作的心态来玩的 但在花费12小时通关以后 我对这款游戏却是一种很微妙的心态 作为一款第一人称射击游戏 它却有着丰富的剧情 这就注定了它是一款独特的游戏 也注定了它本身极高的门槛 对于喜爱研究历史或者是喜爱研究平行世界方面的玩家来说那么这款游戏绝对会让你满意但如果你偏爱的是类似GTA5的游戏 那么建议还是要三思 当然了如果你想要的只是射击的快感那也无妨  总的来说 它并不适合所有人但一旦你进入到布克和伊丽莎白的故事中那么你就会爱上这款游戏 最后 结局真的出人意料  绝对印象深刻  好了 就到这吧  哈利路亚
Одна из лучших игровых вселенных!!!
kegyetlen rossz szar ez
Guter Shooter x)

美轮美奂的天空城，筑起它的是一群形同尸骸劳苦人民。和平的表象，掩盖不住起义人民的枪声和呐喊。如童话般可爱的少女，避免不了她悲惨的命运。
剧情有深度有内涵；战斗趣味横生，不拖沓；画面美轮美奂，宛如油画：第九艺术的代表之作
Отличная и качественная игра с хорошей графикой и интересным сюжетом.

BioShock Infinite, is possibly one of the best games around. It might not be the most ambitious, but all the pieces together will for sure wanting you to replay within ten minutes of staring at your screen after beating and just processing everything you just went through. Solid, solid story, that brings all the series together, and makes you want so much more. The game play is fantastic! Fans of the series will feel right at home with the tweaks and changes, but its very comfortable and easy to grasp right off the bat for anyone wanting to try out this masterpiece for the very first time. The music is amazing! Every fight feels dynamic and all of the locations you travel to, all feel and sound unique, The soundtrack really is killer! And than, of coarse, there is a hard mode, for when you just cant set it down after your fourth play through. It's brutal!

   BioShock Infinite, is fantastic! And I revisit every now and again just to remind myself why I fell in love with the series after playing it.   10/10
一个从来没有发生过的故事
С кайфариком!)

I first played BioShock Infinite way back when it first launched in 2013 on Xbox 360. To this day, it remains one of my favorite gaming experiences of my entire life. The combat is solid (especially on PC) and the story is one of a kind. I have since then completed the DLC which blew my mind. I couldn't recommend this game more, everyone needs to experience BioShock Infinite at least once.
伊丽莎白去到了巴黎，看到了埃菲尔铁塔，枕着微风，望着夕阳，在一片小山坡上静静睡去...
剧情十分的炫酷科幻，值得推荐

这游戏让我想起最后生还者，看网上多说玩了抑郁，玩这作到是没多大感觉，有可能有一丝丝，也许因为INFINITE的结局对我来说总体上还是个正面的结局，男主在E的帮助下得到救赎，逃出了这个loop，E也因为自己解救后全知全能了解了all the thing而原谅了男主。倒是TLOU玩后压抑了两三天，那游戏塑造的世界更大，对人性也刨得更多，玩完完全感到hopeless

Played this first back on Xbox 360 and re experienced it on PC, began to like Elizabeth more and more through out the game and can easily say she has become one of my favorite characters (along with Booker). All i can say now is that this is a game and story I'll never forget.

Also Elizabeth has a nice smile.

I found a treat!, want it?

I buy "this" because it has very good reviews, but the game is very boring, shot everything that moves and eat junk food for 0.01% hp, plot pretend to be a very big thing but is mediocre at best, the protagonist is an asshole that pretend to be cool... Bloom, bloom everywhere... the game is full of poligonal glitches that are very annoying to play... Elizabeth and concept art (except the enemies of course) are the only good things. Waste of money.
elizabeth can sit on me pls
The storyline is wack and the fighting maybe lacking but it's still a good game
mi juego favorito de la saga :)
Ótimo jogo, com ótimos gráficos, jogabilidade incrível e mesmo sendo um jogo de 2013 ainda continua muito bom

So so, so sehen wir uns also wieder. Willkommen im dritten und aktuell letzten Teil der Bioshock Saga? Ja doch Saga!

Ihr habt Euch durch den zweiten Teil geschlagen und werdet nun mit einem strahlenden Lächeln empfangen... Bis die Maske fällt und Ihr wieder erinnert wird, dass Ihr ein Bioshock spielt.

Ihr müsst unbedingt das "DLC" Burial at Sea kaufen und spielen. Das DLC hat es nicht verdient nur DLC genannt zu werden. Die 3-4 h schließen alle losen Fäden von Bioshock 1 und 2 mit Infinite. Also für die Story UNABDINGBAR!
A spectacular extension of the BioShock franchise. This must be the prettiest and most atmospherically perfect game I've ever played. It's nearly flawless. Highly recommend, even today!
ok
The gameplay is a nice mixture of calmly looking everywhere for loot and shooting bad guys. The combat is fairly forgiving even for people who don't play FPS games like myself.

철학적인 스토리와 전작에 비해 업글된 액션, 동화와 같은 멋진 디자인과 그래픽들..
바이오쇼크 명품 시리즈의 진화.

boring and cringing
以前玩的盗版本体现在补了海葬dlc，这游戏玩的太让人压抑了感觉心情都会变差但是剧情又很喜欢，最好先玩完一代再玩dlc，玩完海葬真想把一代boss给活剥了。
Divertido y excelente historia
震撼的沉浸式游戏体验

这作应该是Shock系列(Bio+System)里最突突的一作，节奏非常快，战斗异常激烈，基本没有恐怖要素，也只有一小段可以潜行的地方，流程非常非常短，可探索的区域也不多，剧情也是搞平行宇宙那一套，我个人对五维这个元素还挺烦的。
无数次玩了俩小时就失去了兴致，完全找不到感觉，这次终于耐着性子玩完了，挺不喜欢这作的，但作为普通玩家，对这个游戏还是绝对推荐的。

伊丽莎白简直是游戏界最佳NPC队友。

P.S.以上评测只针对本体，建议一定要买带季票的完全体！两个DLC才给了这部游戏真正的生命！虽然只要涉及到平行宇宙，剧情就肯定会漏洞百出，不过这已经根本不重要了，不多剧透，Shock系列老玩家已圆满，这两个DLC是红色Must Play警告！不玩这俩DLC的话本体等于白玩！
垃圾游戏

Base game was alright, ending sucked.

DLC was really unneccessary. Why did Elizabeth get herself killed like a little bitch. Why convolute the story with two DeWitts. Its just trying to answer questions no one asked, what a waste of time.

Me encanta, una obra de arte, me pase el juego hace unas semanas en dificultad normal explorando todo lo que pude pero me quede con ganas de mas, asi que me puse la dificultad 1999 y aqui estoy completandomela, la primera vez que lo juegas es una experiencia irrepetible, pero la segunda vez no te aburres no, la segunda vez es tambien genial ya que te vas fijando en todos los detalles y lo bien trabajado que esta el juego, uno de mis juegos favoritos sin duda.

Bloody love this game. The subtleties made this game. How in the beginning when the lutece's are talking, and Robert tells her that he DOESN'T row. He doesn't mean that booker is physically incapable or rowing, he means there is no conceivable universe in which Booker rows the boat AND achieves his destiny. Such a great line.
